lines.text:
[on being electrocuted]
All that did was give me a hard on!

[dying]
Lucas, I'm coming back to tear your world apart... I'm going to fuck you up.

[in a squeaky voice]
Don't look now, but your family's dead... just kidding.
[to the various press and officials who have come to witness his execution]
[Max stares directly at Lucas as he is being strapped into the electric chair]
Glad you could make it, cop.

[after Prof. Campbell outlines a plan to stop Jenke]
Interesting theory, Professor Campbell... but there are definitely flaws.
